can only bring -> those : 1
only bring those -> ready : 1
bring those ready -> to : 1
those ready to -> believe : 1
those ready to -> begin : 1
ready to believe -> in : 1
believe in the -> others : 1
in the others -> get : 1
the others get -> out : 1
others get out -> unless : 1
get out unless -> they : 1
out unless they -> believe : 1
unless they believe -> to : 1
they believe to -> that : 1
believe to that -> separates : 1
to that separates -> the : 1
that separates the -> those : 1
separates the those -> ready : 1
the those ready -> to : 1
ready to begin -> from : 1
to begin from -> the : 1
begin from the -> city : 1
from the city -> blind : 1
the city blind -> he : 1
city blind he -> was : 1
blind he was -> just : 1
he was just -> like : 1
was just like -> an : 1
just like an -> old : 1
like an old -> arc : 1
an old arc -> winking : 1
old arc winking -> out : 1
arc winking out -> for : 1
winking out for -> the : 1
out for the -> last : 1
the last started -> down : 1
last started down -> over : 1
started down over -> the : 1
over the marsie -> saw : 1
the marsie saw -> me : 1
marsie saw me -> she : 1
saw me she -> had : 1
me she had -> flowers : 1
she had flowers -> stuck : 1
had flowers stuck -> in : 1
flowers stuck in -> her : 1
stuck in her -> and : 1
was a soft -> furry : 1
a soft furry -> thing : 1
soft furry thing -> in : 1
furry thing in -> her : 1
thing in her -> she : 1
her she put -> it : 1
put it down -> to : 1
it down to -> hop : 1
down to hop -> away : 1
to hop away -> before : 1
hop away before -> she : 1
away before she -> came : 1
before she came -> we : 1
she came we -> wait : 1
came we wait -> for : 1
we wait for -> those : 1
wait for those -> the : 1
for those the -> rhyming : 1
those the rhyming -> man : 1
man and fanna -> came : 1
and fanna came -> together : 1
fanna came together -> two : 1
came together two -> days : 1
together two days -> i : 1
two days i -> know : 1
days i know -> who : 1
i know who -> he : 1
know who he -> or : 1
who he or -> how : 1
he or how -> he : 1
or how he -> works : 1
how he works -> his : 1
he works his -> if : 1
works his if -> we : 1
his if we -> see : 1
if we see -> he : 1
we see he -> never : 1
see he never -> stays : 1
he never stays -> and : 1
never stays and -> he : 1
stays and he -> answer : 1
and he answer -> we : 1
he answer we -> call : 1
answer we call -> him : 1
we call him -> nicholas : 1
call him nicholas -> and : 1
him nicholas and -> we : 1
nicholas and we -> live : 1
and we live -> in : 1
we live in -> london : 1
live in london -> though : 1
in london though -> not : 1
london though not -> nor : 1
though not nor -> a : 1
not nor a -> a : 1
